Yog cov Yixalayees lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob ua ke, leejtwg moog tua tsaj lossis noog kws yog yaam tsaj huv lug noj, yuavtsum muab cov ntshaav laub rua huv aav hab muab aav npoog rua.

Txhua yaam kws caj sa, txujsa yog nyob huv cov ntshaav xwb. Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj has rua cov Yixalayees kuas tsi xob noj tej nqaj kws txhaam ntshaav, yog leejtwg noj, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd rhu tawm ntawm Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg moog.

Txhua tug, tsi has cov Yixalayees lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws moog hlais tej tsaj kws mob tuag lossis tsaj nyaum tum tuag lug ua noj, nwg yuavtsum hle nwg cev rig tsho moog ntxhua, dlaa dlej hab nyob tog txug thaus tsaus ntuj kuas nwg huv tsaiv.
Yog nwg tsi ntxhua nwg tej rig tsho hab dlaa dlej, nwg yuavtsum ris nwg lub txim ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes
kuas has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.

Mej tsi xob xyum ua lawv le cov tuabneeg Iziv kws nyob nraag qhov chaw kws mej tub moog nyob ib zag lawm lossis tsi xob ua le cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws Kana-aas kws kuv taabtom coj mej moog nyob pheej ibtxwm ua.
Mej yuavtsum fwm kuv tej kevcai hab ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv tub saamfwm rua mej lawm. Kuv Yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Mej yuavtsum xyum hab ua lawv le tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm kws kuv muab cob rua mej lawm; yog leejtwg ua lawv le nuav, yuav cawm tau nwg txujsa. Kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tsi xob moog nrug mej tej tuabneeg kws txheeb ze sis ntxag.
Tsi xob ntxag koj nam, ua rua koj txiv poob ntsejmuag. Koj tsi xob ua rua koj nam poob ntsejmuag.
Tsi xob ntxag koj txiv cov quaspuj ib tug twg, ua rua koj txiv poob ntsejmuag hlo le.
Tsi xob ntxag koj tug muam kws yog koj nam yug lossis tug muam kws tsi nrug koj koom nam, tsi has tug kws yug huv koj tsev lossis coj lwm qhov lug los xij.
Tsi xob ntxag koj tug ntxhais xeebntxwv; qhov kws koj ua rua nwg poob ntsejmuag, kuj ua rua koj poob ntsejmuag ib yaam nkaus.
Tsi xob ntxag koj tug muam kws tsi nrug koj koom nam; nwg tub yog koj tug muam ib yaam nkaus hab.
Tsi xob ntxag koj tug pujnyaaj kws yog koj txiv tug muam lossis koj nam tug taislaug lossis tug nam hluas.
Tsi xob ntxag koj tug yawm laug lossis koj tug txiv ntxawm tug quaspuj, rua qhov nwg yog koj tug puj laug lossis koj tug nam ntxawm.
Tsi xob ntxag koj tug nyaab, rua qhov nwg yog koj tug tub tug quaspuj.
Tsi xob ntxag koj tug tijlaug lossis koj tug kwv tug quaspuj, rua qhov yuav ua rua koj tug tijlaug lossis koj tug kwv poob ntsejmuag.
Tsi xob ntxag tug quaspuj kws koj tub tau ntxag dlua lug lawm tug ntxhais lossis nwg tug ntxhais xeebntxwv, rua qhov puab yog koj roj ntshaav, yog koj ua le ntawd txhum kevcai.
Tsi xob moog yuav koj tug quaspuj tug nam hluas lug ua koj tug nam yau, thaus koj tug quaspuj tseem ua neej nyob.
Tsi xob nrug tug quaspuj kws tseem taabtom coj khaub dluag pw, rua qhov nwg lub cev tsi huv lawm.
Tsi xob ntxag lwm tug txivneej tug quaspuj; qhov ntawd yuav ua rua koj lub cev tsi huv.
Tsi xob muab mej tej mivnyuas tua txi tug vaajtswv Maulej, rua qhov yuav ua rua mej tug Vaajtswv kws yog tug TSWV lub npe raug luas thuam tsi zoo.
Tsi pub tej txivneej ntxag txivneej. Vaajtswv ntxub tej kev phem ntawd kawg le.
Mej tsi xob moog ntxag tej tsaj, ua rua mej tsi huv lossis tej quaspuj tsi xob muab nwg lub cev moog rua tej tsaj ntxag. Ua le ntawd yog kev txhum.
Mej tsi xob ua rua mej tsi huv vim tej kev phem nuav, cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav pheej ua le ntawd, kuv txhaj muab puab ntab tawm, kuas mej txhaj tau lug nyob rua huv.
Puab ua rua lub tebchaws nuav tsi huv, yog le ntawd tug TSWV txhaj rau txim rua puab, hab muab puab ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog lawm.

Puab ua ntau yaam kev phem hab ua rua lub tebchaws tsi huv lawm, tabsis mej yuavtsum tsi xob ua tej kev phem ntawd, taagnrho mej suavdlawg, tsi has cov Yixalayees lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob los xij, yuavtsum coj tug TSWV tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm,
yog mej tsi ua le ntawd, ces mej yuav raug ntab ntawm huv lub tebchaws nuav moog ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws nyob ua ntej mej raug ntab tawm lawm.
Yog leejtwg ua tej kev phem kev qas nuav, yuav muab tug ntawd rhu tawm ntawm Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg moog.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej yuavtsum fwm tej lug saamfwm kws kuv muab rua mej hab mej tsi xob xyum ua mej lub neej le cov tuabneeg kws xub nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav hab tsi xob ua rua mej tsi huv vim tej kev txhum nuav. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes
kuas has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Mej yuavtsum ua tuabneeg dlawbhuv, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej Tug Vaajtswv, kuv yog tug Dlawbhuv.
Mej txhua tug yuavtsum fwm mej nam mej txiv, hab ceev nub Xanpataus ua nub tseemceeb, lawv le kuv tub saamfwm rua mej lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Tsi xob tso kuv tseg hab moog pe mlom; tsi xob muab tooj muab hlau nchuav ua mlom rua mej pe. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Thaus mej tua tsaj fij ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV, mej yuavtsum fwm tej kevcai kws kuv muab rua mej lawm, kuv txhaj txaus sab rua mej tej khoom fij ntawd.
Cov nqaj mej yuavtsum muab noj kuas taag rua nub kws mej tua tug tsaj ntawd lossis nub tom qaab. Nub peb tej nqaj kws seem yuavtsum muab hlawv povtseg,
rua qhov tej nqaj ntawd tsi huv lawm, yog leejtwg noj mas kuv yuav tsi txaus sab rua tug ntawd tej khoom fij.
Txhua tug kws noj cov khoom fij ntawd yuav raug txim, rua qhov nwg ua tsi huv rua tej khoom dlawbhuv kws fij rua kuv ntawd, hab yuav muab nwg rhu tawm ntawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog.
“Thaus mej hlais mej tej nplej huv mej tej teb, mej tsi xob hlais cov nplej kws nyob tom ntug teb kuas taag, hab tsi xob rov qaab moog hlais tej naab nplej kws seem.

Tsi xob rov qaab moog sau tej txiv maab kws mej sau tsi taag huv mej tej vaaj txiv maab lossis moog khaws tej txiv maab kws poob rua huv aav; tseg tej txiv ntawd rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Mej tsi xob ua tubsaab, tsi xob ua tsi ncaaj rua lwm tug, hab tsi xob dlaag.
Tsi xob tuav kuv lub npe coglug tsi tseeb, yog mej ua le ntawd yog mej saib tsi taug mej tug Vaajtswv lub npe. Kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Mej tsi xob tsimtxom mej tej kwvtij zej zog lossis nyag nwg tug. Tsi xob sej tej tub zug kws mej ndlav tej nqe zug moog txug taagkig sawv ntxuv.
Tsi xob foom tug tuabneeg laag ntseg lossis muab tej yaam dlaabtsi moog cuab tug tuabneeg dligmuag kev kuas nwg dlawm qaug. Mej yuavtsum paub ntshai mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Tsi xob tu plaub tsi ncaaj, tsi xob saib tsi taug cov pluag lossis tsaa cov npluanuj cai. Tabsis mej yuavtsum txav txim lawv le kev ncaaj nceeg rua mej tej kwvtij zej zog.
Tsi xob moog taug xaiv rua ib leeg tug twg, hab thaus muaj leejtwg raug luas ab lam kws yog lub txim tuag, mej yuavtsum paab has lawv le qhov tseeb kuas dlaws tau nwg dlim. Kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Tsi xob ntxub ib leeg tug twg rua nruab sab, tabsis yuavtsum moog nrug nwg sis has kuas hum, mej txhaj yuav tsi ua txhum, vim qhov mej ntxub nwg.
Tsi xob ua phem pauj rua ib leeg tug twg lossis pheej ntxub nwg, tabsis yuavtsum hlub mej cov kwvtij zej zog ib yaam le mej hlub mej lub cev. Kuv yog tug TSWV.

“Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm. Tsi xob muab ib yaam tsaj lug tso taw rua ib yaam tsaj kuas txuam tsoov. Tsi xob muab ob yaam noob qoob moog tseb rua huv ib dlaim teb, tsi xob naav tej rig tsho kws muab ob yaam ntaub lug xaws ua ke.

“Yog ib tug ntxhais qhev twg leeg moog ua ib tug txivneej twg tug nam yau lawm, tabsis tug txivneej ntawd tseem tsi tau them nqe hab coj nwg moog, yog muaj lwm tug txivneej tuaj ntxag nwg, mas obtug yuavtsum raug txim, tabsis  tsi xob muab tua, rua qhov nwg tseem yog ib tug txhais qhev.
Tug txivneej ntawd yuavtsum coj ib tug laug yaaj moog rua ntawm lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj, muab tua fij rua tug TSWV dlaws tug ntawd tej kev txhum,
hab tug povthawj muab tug laug yaaj fij dlaws tug txivneej ntawd txujkev txhum, Vaajtswv txhaj yuav zaam nwg lub txim.

“Thaus mej moog txug rua huv lub tebchaws Kana-aas hab cog txhua yaam txiv ntoo, mej yuavtsum suav ntsoov thawj peb lub xyoo cov txiv ntoo ntawd tseem tsi tau huv. Thaus lub sijhawm ntawd mej tsi xob dle cov txiv ntoo ntawd lug noj.
Xyoo plaub txhua yaam txiv maab txiv ntoo yuavtsum muab fij rua kuv  kws yog tug TSWV.
Tabsis xyoo tsib mej maam le dle cov txiv ntoo ntawd lug noj. Yog mej ua txhua yaam nuav, mej tej txiv ntoo yuav txi txiv ncw. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Mej tsi xob noj tej nqaj kws txhaam ntshaav. Mej tsi xob xyum ua txhua yaam yeegsiv lossis ua neeb ua yaig.
Mej tsi xob txav mej cov plaubhau ntawm ob saab pobkub lossis chais mej cov fwjtxwv.
Mej tsi xob muab koob nkaug ua tej tug dluab rua ntawm mej lub cev, hab tsi xob muab mej tej nqaj hlais kuas to moog quaj nyav tej tuabneeg tuag. Kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Tsi xob ua rua mej tej ntxhais txaajmuag kws yog tso puab moog ua namndlav,  yog mej ua le ntawd, mej yuav moog pe lwm tug vaajtswv hab lub tebchaws yuav puv nkaus kev nkauj kev nraug.
Ncu ntsoov nub Xanpataus yog nub su, hab fwm lub chaw kws mej moog pehawm kuv. Kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Mej tsi xob moog cuag txivneeb lossis saib yaig hlo le. Yog mej moog ua le ntawd, mej yuav ua tuabneeg tsi huv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Mej yuavtsum fwm hab ua ncaaj rua cov tuabneeg laug. Mej yuavtsum paub ntshai kuv; kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Tsi xob saib tsi taug cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob huv mej lub tebchaws.

Ua zoo rua puab ib yaam le mej ua zoo rua mej cov Yixalayees, hab hlub puab ib yaam le mej hlub mej lub cev. Ncu ntsoov has tas, thaus u mej tau thojnaam ib zag moog nyob rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Tsi xob ua tuabneeg tsi ncaaj kws muab raab teev ntxo luj rua luas, tsi xob txaav txuj hlua ntsuag noj luas, hab tsi xob muab lub kawm tsi txwm luj rua luas.
Siv raab teev kws tsi ntxo, lub thauj kws hum txaj hab lub kawm kws txwm sab. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Mej yuavtsum fwm kuv tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm. Kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes

kuas ca le has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Mej cov Yixalayees txhua tug lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob ua ke, yog leejtwg muab nwg cov mivnyuas rua luas tua txi tug vaajtswv Maulej, ces kuas tej tuabneeg zej zog muab pobzeb ntaus tug ntawd kuas tuag moog.

Yog leejtwg muab nwg ib tug mivnyuas txi tug vaajtswv Maulej, ua rua kuv lub Tsevntaub kws dlawbhuv tsi huv, hab ua rua kuv lub npe dlawbhuv raug thuam, kuv yuav tawmtsaam nwg hab muab nwg rhu tawm ntawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog.
Tabsis yog cov pejxeem tsi quavntsej tug kws muab nwg tug mivnyuas txi tug vaajtswv Maulej hab tsi muab tug ntawd tua kuas tuag,
kuv yuav tawmtsaam tug ntawd hab nwg tsev tuabneeg, hab cov tuabneeg kws tso kuv tseg moog pe tug vaajtswv Maules. Kuv yuav muab puab rhu tawm ntawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog.
“Yog leejtwg moog thov tej txivneeb ua neeb saib nwg, kuv yuav tawmtsaam tug ntawd hab yuav muab nwg rhu tawm ntawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog.
Mej yuavtsum ua tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab dlawbhuv, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Mej ca le coj lawv le kuv tej kevcai, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV hab yog tug ua kuas mej dlawbhuv.
“Yog leejtwg foom tsi zoo rua nwg txiv lossis nwg nam, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua kuas tuag; vim nwg tau foom tsi zoo rua nwg txiv lossis Nwg nam, lub txim tuag txhaj poob rua sau nwg.
“Yog tug txivneej twg moog ntxag tej tuabneeg zej zog quaspuj, ca le muab ob tug kws sis ntxag ntawd tua povtseg.
Yog tug txivneej twg ntxag nwg txiv tug quaspuj, ua rua nwg txiv poob ntsejmuag, ca le muab obtug tua povtseg. Vim obtug tau ua txhum, lub txim tuag txhaj poob rua sau obtug.
Yog tug txivneej twg ntxag nwg tug nyaab, ca le muab obtug tua povtseg. Vim obtug tau ua txhum, lub txim tuag txhaj poob rua sau obtug.
Yog ob tug txivneej twg sis ntxag, yog obtug ua le ntawd, yog obtug ua kev phem kev qas heev, yuavtsum muab obtug tua povtseg, vim obtug tau ua txhum, lub txim tuag txhaj poob rua sau obtug.

Yog leejtwg yuav leej nam hab tug ntxhais lug ua quaspuj huv tuabsi. Qhov kws ua le ntawd, yog kev phem kev qas heev, yuavtsum muab suavtawg hlawv puab kuas tuag; txhaj yuav tsi muaj txujkev phem kev qas nuav nyob huv mej lub tebchaws ntxiv lawm.
Yog tug txivneej twg ntxag tej tsaj txhu, yuavtsum muab nwg hab tug tsaj ntawd tua povtseg.
Yog tug quaspuj twg ntxag tsaj, yuavtsum muab nwg hab tug tsaj ntawd tua povtseg; vim obtug tau ua txhum, lub txim tuag txhaj poob rua sau obtug.

“Yog leejtwg yuav nwg tug muam kws koom nam koom txiv lossis txiv tshab lossis nam tshab tug ntxhais ua quaspuj, obtug yuav raug kev txaajmuag taabmeeg tebchaws. Ca le muab obtug ntab tawm ntawm suavdlawg moog, rua qhov nwg yuav nwg tug muam, nwg txhaj yuavtsum ris lub txim ntawd.

Yog tug txivneej twg nrug ib tug quaspuj twg pw thaus tug quaspuj ntawd taabtom coj khaub dluag, ca le muab obtug ntab tawm ntawm suavdlawg moog, rua qhov obtug ua txhum tej kevcai kws has txug kev ua tsi huv lawm.
“Yog tug txivneej twg ntxag nwg txiv cov muam lossis nwg nam cov vivncaug, obtug yuavtsum ris lub txim kws ua txhum ntawd, rua qhov yog tej txheeb ze sis ntxag.

Yog tug txivneej twg moog ntxag nwg tug yawm laug lossis nwg tug txiv ntxawm tug quaspuj, vim nwg ua rua nwg tug yawm laug lossis tug txiv ntxawm poob ntsejmuag, obtug yuavtsum raug txim; hab obtug yuav tsi muaj mivnyuas moog txug nub tuag.

Yog tug txivneej twg txeeb nwg tug tijlaug lossis nwg tug kwv tug quaspuj yuav, obtug yuav tsi muaj mivnyuas moog txug nub tuag, vim nwg ua tej yaam tsi huv hab rhuav nwg tug tijlaug lossis nwg tug kwv ntsejmuag.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej yuavtsum coj lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab kuv tej lug saamfwm, mej txhaj yuav tsi raug ntab tawm huv lub tebchaws Kana-aas kws kuv muab rua mej lawm.

Mej tsi xob moog coj cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd tej kevcai; kuv muab cov tuabneeg ntawd ntab tawm moog, mej txhaj tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Puab pheej ua tej kev phem kev qas, kuv txhaj ntxub puab heev.

Tabsis kuv tau coglug muab lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob rua mej ua mej tug, hab rua mej nyob moog le. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug kws muab mej cais tawm ntawm lwm tsaav tuabneeg moog nyob rua ib caag.

Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum saib tej tsaj hab tej noog kuas tseeb saib yaam twg huv hab yaam twg tsi huv. Tsi xob noj tej tsaj lossis tej noog kws tsi huv. Kuv tub qha tej tsaj tsi huv rua mej lawm, yog mej noj tej tsaj ntawd yuav ua rua mej tsi huv.
Mej yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab yog kuv tug, mej yuavtsum ua tuabneeg dlawbhuv, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV hab kuv yog tug dlawbhuv. Kuv tau xaiv mej tawm ntawm lwm tsaav tuabneeg lug ua kuv tug.
“Tug txivneej lossis tug quaspuj twg ua neeb hab ua khawvkoob, yuavtsum muab pobzeb ntaus nwg kuas tuag. Tug kws ua tej nuav lub txim tuag yuav poob rua sau nwg.”
Tug TSWV saamfwm rua Mauxes kuas has rua Aloos cov tub kws yog cov povthawj has tas, “Tsi pub cov povthawj ib tug twg lub cev tsi huv, vim nwg moog quaj nyav tej kwvtij neejtsaa kws tuag lawm,
tsuas pub nwg quaj nyav tug kws yog nwg tsev tuabneeg, nwg nam, nwg txiv, nwg tug tub, nwg tug ntxhais, nwg tug tijlaug, nwg tug kwv,
lossis nwg tug muam kws tsi tau yuav quasyawg kws tseem nrug nwg nyob ua ib tse xwb.
Nwg tsi xob ua rua nwg tsi huv kws yog moog saib tej tuabneeg txheeb ze tuag.
“Tsi pub cov povthawj chais plaubhau lossis chais fwjtxwv lossis hlais puab tej nqaj qha rua suavdlawg paub has tas, puab raug kev txomnyem quaj ntsuag.

Puab yuavtsum ua tuabneeg dlawbhuv rua puab tug Vaajtswv, hab tsi xob ua rua puab tug Vaajtswv lub npe raug thuam; vim puab yog cov kws muab tej khoom hlawv fij rua tug TSWV, hab muab tej ncuav fij rua puab tug Vaajtswv; puab yuavtsum yog tuabneeg dlawbhuv.
Puab tsi xob moog yuav tug namndlav lossis tug quaspuj kws tsi huv lawm lossis puab tsi xob moog yuav tug puj nrauj lug ua quaspuj, rua qhov tug povthawj yog tug dlawbhuv rua nwg tug Vaajtswv.
Suavdlawg yuavtsum suav tug povthawj ua tug dlawbhuv, rua qhov nwg yog tug kws muab tej khoom fij rua mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug TSWV; kuv yog tug dlawbhuv hab ua kuas mej dlawbhuv.
Yog tug povthawj twg tug ntxhais moog ua namndlav, nwg yog tug kws rhuav nwg txiv ntsejmuag, yuavtsum muab nwg hlawv kuas tuag.”

“Tug Povthawj Hlub yog tug kws luas muab cov roj txhawb meejthawj laub rua sau nwg taubhau, tsaa nwg ua tug Povthawj Hlub kws naav cev rig tsho povthawj. Yog le ntawd, nwg yuavtsum ntsis nwg cov plaubhau lossis tsi xob dlua nwg cev rig tsho qha kuas luas paub has tas nwg muaj kev quaj ntsuag.

Nwg tsi xob ua rua nwg lub cev tsi huv lossis ua rua kuv lub Tsevntaub kws dlawbhuv tsi huv kws yog nwg moog rua huv lub tsev paam tuag, txawm yog tug tuag ntawd yog nwg nam nwg txiv kag los tsi xob moog, rua qhov tub muab nwg tsaa ua povthawj rua kuv lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV.
Nwg yuavtsum yuav ib tug ntxhais nkaujxwb lug ua nwg quaspuj xwb,
tsi xob yuav puj ntsuag, puj nrauj lossis tug hluas nkauj kws moog ua dlua namndlav lawm. Nwg yuavtsum yuav nwg caajceg ib tug ntxhais kws tseem yog nkaujxwb lug ua nwg tug quaspuj.
Yog tsi ua le nuav, nyob tsaam nwg cov mivnyuas kws yog cov dlawbhuv yuav ua tuabneeg tsi huv lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV hab kuv tsaa nwg ua tug Povthawj hlub.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes
kuas has rua Aloos has tas, “Tsi xob pub koj tej xeebntxwv kws muaj mob tsi huv coj tej khoom tuaj fij rua kuv hlo le. Qhov nuav mej yuavtsum coj moog ibtxhis le.
Tsi pub tug tuabneeg kws muaj mob le nraag nuav coj khoom moog fij: tsi pub tug tuabneeg kws dligmuag, luv ceg, ntsejmuag caws plav lossis tug kws teg taw tsi ntev ib yaam.
Tsi pub tug tuabneeg qhuav npaab lossis qhuav ceg;
tsi pub tug tuabneeg khoov dluav lossis tug tuabneeg moj pob; tsi pub tug tuabneeg kws mob qhovmuag lab lossis mob kavlis, hab tug txivneej kws muab saam lawm.
Aloos cov xeebntxwv kws ua povthawj, yog leejtwg muaj mob tsi huv, nwg tsi xob coj khoom tuaj hlawv fij rua kuv.
Rua qhov tug txivneej ntawd yuav noj tej zaub mov kws muab fij rua kuv, tsi has cov khoom fij kws dlawbhuv hab cov khoom fij kws dlawbhuv kawg nkaus,

tabsis vim qhov kws nwg muaj mob tsi huv, nwg tsi xob moog ze rua ntawm dlaim ntaub thaiv Chaav dlawbhuv hab lub thaaj. Nwg tsi xob moog ua rua tej khoom dlawbhuv tsi huv, vim kuv yog tug TSWV kws ua rua tej khoom ntawd dlawbhuv.”
Mauxes yeej muab tej nuav qha rua Aloos, Aloos cov tub hab taagnrho cov Yixalayees huv tuabsi lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes

kuas has rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub has tas, “Mej yuavtsum ceev tej khoom fij dlawbhuv kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua kuv kuas zoo. Mej txhaj tsi ua rua kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv raug thuam, kuv yog tug TSWV.

Yog mej cov xeebntxwv leejtwg, thaus nwg lub cev tseem tsi tau huv, nwg ca le moog ze rua ntawm tej khoom fij dlawbhuv kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua kuv, nwg yuav tsi tau ua kuv teg num fij khoom ntawm lub thaaj moog le lawm. Qhov nuav mej yuavtsum coj moog ibtxhis le. Kuv yog tug TSWV.

“Aloos cov xeebntxwv yog muaj leejtwg mob ruas lossis mob ua kuas paug, ces tsi xob pub nwg noj tej khoom fij dlawbhuv moog txug thaus nwg lub cev zoo huv lawm. Tug povthawj kws tsi huv mas yog tug kws moog kov tug tuabneeg tuag lub cev lossis nwg muaj mob ua kua paug rua nwg qhov chaw xis
lossis nwg moog kov tej tsaj tsi huv lossis tej tuabneeg tsi huv.
Tug povthawj twg kws nwg lub cev tsi huv lawm, nwg yuav tsi huv moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj, hab nwg tsi xob noj tej khoom fij kws dlawbhuv moog txug thaus nwg dlaa dlej taag tsaiv.
Tom qaab lub nub poob qho lawm, nwg txhaj le huv, ces nwg maam le noj tau tej khoom fij dlawbhuv kws yog nwg tej zaub mov.
Nwg tsi xob noj tej tsaj kws nwg tuag nwg lossis yog tej tsaj qus tum tuag; cov nqaj ntawd yuav ua rua nwg tsi huv. Kuv yog tug TSWV.

“Txhua tug povthawj yuavtsum fwm tej kevcai kws kuv tau muab rua puab lawm. Yog puab tsi fwm, puab yuav raug txim hab yuav tuag, rua qhov puab tsi fwm kuv tej kevcai kws tseemceeb. Kuv yog tug TSWV hab yog tug ua kuas puab dlawbhuv.

“Tsuas yog tug povthawj tsev tuabneeg nkaus xwb, txhaj noj tau tej khoom fij kws dlawbhuv; tsi pub tej tuabneeg saab nrau noj tej khoom fij ntawd le, txawm yog tug tuabneeg kws nrug tug povthawj nyob lossis tug tub zug kws nwg ndlav ua num los yeej noj tsi tau le.
Tabsis tug povthawj tug tubkhai kws nwg muab nyaj yuav lug lossis tug kws yug huv nwg tsev, txhaj noj tau tej khoom fij kws yog tug povthawj tug.
Tug povthawj tug ntxhais kws moog yuav quasyawg lawm, yog nwg tug quasyawg tsi yog ib tug povthawj, nwg yuavtsum tsi xob noj tej khoom fij kws dlawbhuv ntawd.
Tabsis tug puj ntsuag lossis tug puj nrauj kws tseem tsi tau muaj mivnyuas kws rov lug nrug nwg txiv nyob huv nwg txiv tsev txhaj noj tau tej khoom kws yog tug povthawj tug.

“Yog leejtwg tsi yog tug povthawj tsev tuabneeg, yog nwg tsi paub hab moog muab tau tej khoom fij dlawbhuv noj lawm, nwg yuavtsum them cov khoom ntawd puv ntoob rov qaab hab ntxiv neeg nkaum feem pua rua tug povthawj.
Cov povthawj yuavtsum ceev tej khoom dlawbhuv kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV ntawd kuas zoo, tsi xob ua rua tej khoom ntawd tsi huv
kws yog ca tug tuabneeg tsi muaj cai tau noj tej khoom fij ntawd; qhov nuav yuav ua rua tug tuabneeg ntawd ua txhum hab raug txim. Kuv yog tug TSWV hab yog tug ua rua tej khoom fij ntawd dlawbhuv.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes

kuas muab tej kevcai nuav qha rua Aloos, Aloos cov tub hab cov Yixalayees has tas, thaus cov Yixalayees lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob, coj khoom tuaj hlawv fij, tsi has fij ua tsaug rua tej lug cog tseg lossis coj tuaj fij ntawm lub sab dlawb paug, tug tsaj ntawd yuavtsum muab tug kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem hlo le.
Tug tsaj ntawd tsi has nyuj, tshis lossis yaaj, yuavtsum yog tug txiv hab tsi muaj ib qhov phem hlo le, txhaj hum tug TSWV sab.
Yog mej muab tej tsaj phem tuaj fij, tug TSWV yuav tsi yuav tug tsaj ntawd.

Thaus mej leejtwg muab khoom tuaj fij ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV lossis fij ua tsaug rua tej lug cog tseg lossis coj tuaj fij ntawm lub sab dlawb paug, yuavtsum yog tug tsaj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le txhaj hum tug TSWV sab.
Tsi xob muab tej tsaj dligmuag, luv ceg, tu ceg, mob rwj, mob txhaab qawj lossis muaj caws plav, coj moog tua ua khoom fij lossis muab hlawv rua sau lub thaaj fij rua tug TSWV hlo le.
Tej tsaj kws mej coj moog tua fij ntawm lub sab dlawb paug, txawm yog to mivntsiv lossis tsi zoo pistsawg los tau, tabsis tsi xob muab moog fij ua tsaug rua tej kev coglug.
Tsi xob muab tug tsaj kws noobqais mob, tawg, to lossis muab saam lawm, coj moog fij rua tug TSWV. Tsi pub mej ua le nuav nyob huv mej lub tebchaws.
Tsi xob muab tej tsaj kws mej yuav ntawm lwm tsaav tuabneeg lug tua ua khoom fij rua tug TSWV. Tej tsaj ntawd yog tsaj tsi zoo hab tsi huv, kuv tsi yuav tej tsaj ntawd ua khoom fij.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, thaus tug mivnyuas nyuj lossis mivnyuas yaaj lossis mivnyuas tshis nyavnyuas yug, yuavtsum ca nrug leej nam xyaa nub, tom qaab ntawm maam le muab coj moog tua hlawv fij txhaj hum tug TSWV sab.
Tsi xob muab tug maum nyuj hab tug mivnyuas lossis tug maum yaaj hab tug mivnyuas, lossis tug maum tshis hab tug mivnyuas ua ib nub tua ua khoom fij.
Thaus mej muab khoom moog fij ua tug TSWV tsaug, mej yuavtsum ua kuas lawv le kevcai txhaj hum tug TSWV sab,
ca le noj tej khoom fij kuas taag rua nub ntawd hab tsi pub kuas seem ib dlaim nqaj moog txug nub tom qaab le.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm; kuv yog tug TSWV.
Mej tsi xob ua rua kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv raug luas txobthuam; taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuavtsum paub has tas, kuv yog tug dlawbhuv hab yog tug kws ua kuas mej dlawbhuv;
hab kuv yog tug kws coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, kuas kuv tau ua mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes
kuas qha rua cov Yixalayees paub has tas, tej rooj noj rooj haus kws tug TSWV teem tseg, yog tug TSWV tej rooj noj rooj haus kws dlawbhuv.

“Mej ua num rau nub, tabsis nub xyaa yog nub Xanpataus kws yog nub su. Nub ntawd mej tsi xob ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le; tabsis mej yuavtsum tuaj sis sau pehawm tug TSWV. Tsi has mej yuav nyob qhov twg, nub Xanpataus yog tug TSWV nub.
Nuav yog tej rooj noj rooj haus dlawbhuv kws tug TSWV teem tseg, mej yuavtsum ua tej rooj noj rooj haus ntawd thaus txug lub sijhawm kws teem tseg.”
“Mej ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau qhuas tug TSWV, yog pib ua rua lub ib hlis ntuj, nub kaum plaub, thaus nub poob qho yuav tsaus ntuj.
Nub kaum tsib yog nub kws pib ua kevcai noj Ncuav tsi xyaw keeb, hab xyaa nub ntawd, mej yuavtsum tsi xob noj tej ncuav kws xyaw keeb hlo le.
Thawj nub mej tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv hab nub ntawd tsi xob ua mej tej num ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Coj mej tej khoom moog hlawv fij rua tug TSWV kuas txwm xyaa nub ntawd. Nub xyaa mej rov tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv, nub ntawd tsi xob ua mej tej num.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, thaus mej moog txug rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej nyob lawm, hab thaus mej sau tau mej tej qoobloo, mej ca le coj thawj teg nplej moog rua tug povthawj.
Nwg yuav muab teg nplej ntawd yom fij rua tug TSWV, tug TSWV txhaj le txaus sab rua mej. Nub tom qaab kws dlhau nub Xanpataus lawm, tug povthawj maam le coj moog fij rua tug TSWV.
Nub kws mej fij mej tej qoobloo, nub ntawd mej yuavtsum coj ib tug thaav yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le moog tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV.

Hab muab plaub choj moov nplej zuaj xyaw roj txiv ntoo coj moog hlawv fij. Tej paa khoom fij ntawd yuav tsw qaab ntxag ua rua tug TSWV txaus sab heev. Mej yuavtsum muab ib laamfwj cawv txiv maab coj moog fij hab.

Mej tsi xob rawm noj tej qoobloo tshab kws mej muab tau lug, tsi has noj nyoog, muab kib noj lossis muab cub ua ncuav noj moog txug nub kws mej coj thawj teg nplej moog fij rua Vaajtswv tsaiv, tsi has mej nyob qhov twg, qhov nuav yog txuj kevcai rua mej tej xeebntxwv coj moog ibtxhis le.
“Suav kuas txwm nkaus xyaa lub limtam, pib nub tom qaab kws mej coj mej thawj teg nplej tuaj fij rua tug TSWV.
Suav kuas txwm tsib caug nub tom qaab lub Xanpataus xyaa, mej ca le rov coj mej tej qoob tshab tuaj fij rua tug TSWV.

Ib yig twg yuavtsum nqaa ob lub ncuav moog yom fij rua tug TSWV. Ib lub ncuav twg yuavtsum yog muab plaub choj moov nplej zuaj cub xyaw keeb hab coj moog fij rua tug TSWV thaus mej pib sau thawj phaum qoob.

Cov pejxeem suavdlawg yuavtsum coj xyaa tug thaav yaaj kws noobnyoog ib xyoos, ib tug txiv nyuj hab ob tug laug tshis kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le moog fij nrug cov ncuav ntawd. Puab yuavtsum muab cov tsaj ntawd hlawv fij rua tug TSWV, nrug cov ncuav hab cov cawv txiv maab ua ke. Tej paa khoom fij ntawd yuav tsw qaab ntxag txaus tug TSWV sab.
Hab muab ib tug laug tshis coj moog fij dlaws txim, hab ob tug thaav yaaj kws noobnyoog ib xyoos moog fij ua kev sis raug zoo.
Tug povthawj yuavtsum muab cov ncuav nrug ob tug thaav yaaj coj moog yom fij ua ke rua tug TSWV, cov khoom nuav yog muab ua cov povthawj tug. Cov khoom fij nuav yog ib cov kws dlawbhuv.
Nub ntawd mej tsi xob tawm moog ua ib yaam num le, tabsis mej yuavtsum tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv. Mej tej xeebntxwv yuavtsum coj txuj kevcai nuav moog ibtxhis le, tsi has mej nyob qhov twg le.

“Thaus mej hlais mej tej nplej, mej tsi xob hlais tej naab nplej kws nyob ntawm tej ceg kaum teb, hab tsi xob moog hlais tej naab nplej kws seem; ca tej ntawd rua cov tuabneeg txomnyem hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws. Tug TSWV yog mej tug Vaajtswv.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, lub xyaa hli ntuj nub xab ib, yog nub kws mej su hab mej ca le tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv thaus mej nov suab raaj suab xyu nrov.
Coj tej khoom tuaj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV hab tsi xob ua mej tej num hlo le.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, lub xyaa hli ntuj nub xab kaug yog txwm rua nub kws ua kevcai theej cov pejxeem suavdlawg lub txhoj. Nub ntawd mej yoo mov hab tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv, hab coj tej khoom tuaj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV.
Nub ntawd tsi xob ua mej tej num, rua qhov yog nub kws ua kevcai theej mej lub txhoj.
Nub ntawd yog leejtwg noj ib yaam dlaabtsi, yuav muab tug ntawd rhu tawm ntawm Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg moog.
Hab yog nub ntawd leejtwg tseem ua nwg tej num, tug TSWV yuav muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.
Txawm yog mej nyob qhov twg los mej hab mej cov xeebntxwv yuavtsum coj txuj kevcai nuav moog ibtxhis le.
Lub hlis ntawd nub xab cuag thaus nub poob qho moog txug nub xab kaug thaus nub poob qho, mej muab ua nub su. Nub ntawd mej tsi xob noj ib yaam dlaabtsi hlo le.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, lub xyaa hli ntuj nub kaum tsib yog nub ua Kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab hab nyob kuas txwm nkaus xyaa nub.
Thawj nub mej ca le tuaj sis sau pehawm Vaajtswv hab tsi xob ua mej tej num hlo le.

Mej yuavtsum naj nub nqaa khoom tuaj fij rua tug TSWV kuas txwm xyaa nub ntawd. Nub yim mej rov tuaj sis sau dlua pehawm Vaajtswv hab coj tej khoom tuaj fij rua tug TSWV. Nub ntawd yog nub pehawm Vaajtswv nkaus xwb, mej tsi xob ua num hlo le.

(“Tej nuav yog ua kev sis sau tuaj ua kevcai pehawm qhuas tug TSWV hab muab tej khoom tuaj fij, hlawv tej khoom fij, fij tej qoobloo, fij tej khoom theej txhoj hab fij tej cawv txiv maab, lawv le nyag xaav coj tuaj fij ib nub dlhau ib nub.

Tej kevcai nuav yog ua ntxiv rua Nub Xanpataus kws ibtxwm ua lug lawm. Hab tej khoom fij nuav yog ntxiv rua mej tej khoom kws mej ibtxwm coj moog fij, yog tej kws mej fij ua tsaug rua tej lug cog tseg, hab tej khoom fij kws mej fij rua tug TSWV ntawm lub sab dlawb paug.)
“Thaus mej sau mej tej qoobloo tom teb lug rua huv tsev taag lawm, mej yuavtsum ua kevcai kuas txwm nkaus xyaa nub, pib nub kaum tsib lub xyaa hli ntuj. Nub ib hab nub yim yog ob nub kws mej su.
Nub ib, mej xaiv mej tej txiv ntoo kws zoo tshaaj plawg, tej nplooj toovlaaj hab tej ceg ntoo kws muaj nplooj coj tuaj ua kevcai qhuas tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Txhua lub xyoo thaus lub xyaa hli ntuj, mej ua kevcai rua tug TSWV xyaa nub. Muab txuj kevcai nuav qha rua mej cov xeebntxwv coj moog ibtxhis le.
Cov Yixalayees txhua tug yuavtsum nyob tsev Pheebsuab xyaa nub,

kuas mej cov xeebntxwv txhaj yuav paub has tas, tug TSWV yog tug kws ca cov Yixalayees nyob huv tej Tsev pheebsuab ntawd thaus nwg coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj muab tej kevcai kws tug TSWV teem tseg nuav qha rua cov Yixalayees paub.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas.
“Koj ca le has rua cov Yixalayees kuas ca le nqaa tej tseem roj txiv ntoo kws zoo tshaaj plawg tuaj saam rua cov teeb huv lub Tsevntaub, tej nplaim teeb txhaj yuav cig pum kev laam lug moog le.

Txhua mo Aloos yuavtsum moog taws cov teeb kws nyob saab nrau dlaim ntaub thaiv lub Phijxaab huv Chaav Dlawbhuv kawg nkaus huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, kuas cov teeb cig laam lug ib mos kaaj ntug. Mej yuavtsum coj txuj kevcai nuav moog ibtxhis le.
Aloos yuavtsum tu ntshis cov teeb sau tug ncej kws muab kub ua, hab saib cov teeb kuas cig laam lug taabmeeg tug TSWV moog le.
“Muab neeg nkaum choj moov nplej coj lug ntse puab ua kaum ob lub ncuav coj moog cub.
Muab cov ncuav ntawd coj moog tso taabmeeg tug TSWV rua sau lub rooj kws muab kub vuam, hab muab teeb ua ob leej, ib leejtwg rau lub.
Muab tej tseem moov tshuaj tsw qaab lug nphoo rua sau ob leej ncuav ntawd, ib yaam le muab ua khoom fij hloov cov ncuav ntawd chaw ua kev ncu txug rua tug TSWV.
Txhua nub Xanpataus yuavtsum coj ncuav moog tso rua sau lub rooj taabmeeg tug TSWV. Cov Yixalayees yuavtsum ua le nuav moog ibtxhis le.

Cov ncuav nuav yog Aloos hab nwg cov xeebntxwv tug, puab yuavtsum coj moog noj huv ib chaav dlawbhuv, rua qhov yog ib feem dlawbhuv ntawm cov khoom kws coj moog fij rua tug TSWV kws yog cov povthawj tug.”

Muaj ib tug txivneej, nwg txiv yog tuabneeg Iziv hab nwg nam yog tuabneeg Yixalayees kws yog Dilis tug ntxhais hu ua Silaumis hab yog xeem Daas. Tug txivneej ntawd txawm nrug ib tug Yixalayees sis tshe huv lub yeej. Thaus obtug taabtom sis tshe, tug txivneej ntawd txawm tsawm foom tug TSWV, yog le ntawd, puab txhaj le coj nwg moog cuag Mauxes,
hab tso tuabneeg zuv nwg, tog saib tug TSWV yuav qha kuas puab ua le caag rua nwg.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Koj ca le coj tug txivneej nuav tawm huv lub yeej nuav moog rua saab nrau ntug yeej, kuas txhua tug kws nov tug txivneej ntawd tshev, yuavtsum tsaa nwg txhais teg rua sau tug txivneej ntawd taubhau ua timkhawv has tas, nwg yeej yog tuabneeg txhum tag. Ces cov pejxeem ca le muab pobzeb ntaus kuas nwg tuag.
Hab qha rua cov Yixalayees txhua tug has tas, yog leejtwg tsawm foom Vaajtswv, nwg yuavtsum ris lub txim ntawd,

hab muab nwg tua kuas tuag. Cov Yixalayees txhua tug lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees, yog leejtwg tsawm foom tug TSWV, ces cov Yixalayees yuavtsum muab pobzeb ntaus kuas tug ntawd tuag moog.
“Yog leejtwg tua tuabneeg, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua povtseg,
hab yog leejtwg tua tej tuabneeg zej zog tej tsaj tuag, yuavtsum muab tsaj moog pauj tsaj xwb. Lub ntsab lug mas yog muab sav pauj sav.
“Yog leejtwg ua rua nwg tej phoojywg zej zog ib tug twg raug mob, nwg ua rua luas le caag, yuavtsum muab nwg ua kuas zoo le ntawd.

Yog nwg luv luas ib tug txhaa, yuavtsum muab nwg ib tug txhaa luv pauj; yog nwg kaus luas ib lub qhovmuag, yuavtsum muab nwg ib lub qhovmuag kaus pauj. Yog nwg tsoo luas ib tug nav luv, yuavtsum muab nwg ib tug nav tsoo kuas luv pauj. Nwg ua rua lwm tug raug mob le caag, yuavtsum ua kuas nwg raug mob ib yaam le ntawd hab.
Leejtwg tua ib tug tsaj tuag, nwg yuavtsum muab ib tug tsaj moog them tug ntawd, tabsis yog leejtwg tua tuabneeg tuag, yuavtsum muab nwg tua pauj xwb.
Txuj kevcai nuav muab cob rua mej txhua tug kws yog cov Yixalayees hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.”

Thaus Mauxes has le nuav rua cov Yixalayees lawm, puab txhaj coj tug txivneej kws tsawm foom Vaajtswv ntawd moog rua nrau ntug yeej hab suavdlawg muab pobzeb ntaus nwg tuag lawm. Qhov nuav yog cov Yixalayees ua lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes sau lub Roob Xinais has tas,
“Koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab pub rua mej lawm, mej yuavtsum fwm tug TSWV, xyoo xyaa mej tsi xob cog qoob rua huv mej tej laj tej teb.
Mej muab rau lub xyoos cog qoobloo rua huv mej tej laj tej teb, taav mej tej txiv maab huv mej tej vaaj hab sau mej tej qoobloo lug ca.
Tabsis xyoo xyaa yog xyoo kws ca tej laj tej teb ntawd su, rua qhov yog xyoo su rua tug TSWV. Tsi xob cog qoobloo rua huv mej tej laj tej teb hab tsi xob taav mej tej txiv maab huv mej tej vaaj le.

Mej tsi xob moog hlais tej nplej kws nwg tuaj nwg huv mej tej laj tej teb kws tsi muaj tuabneeg tseb hab tsi xob moog dle tej txiv maab kws mej tsi tau taav; lub xyoo nuav yuavtsum ca lub tebchaws su, tsi xob ua ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Txawm yog xyoo ntawd tej laj tej teb su tsi cog qoobloo los mej yuav muaj zaub muaj mov txaus rua mej cov tubqhe, mej cov tub zug, cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob,
hab tej tsaj nyeg tsaj qus kws nyob huv mej lub tebchaws noj. Txhua yaam kws tuaj huv tej laj tej teb puavleej noj tau huv tuabsi.
“Mej suav xyaa xyoo xyaa zag, taagnrho yog muaj plaub caug cuaj xyoos.
Ces thaus lub xyaa hli ntuj nub xab kaug, yog nub theej txhoj, tso ib tug txivneej moog tshuab raaj tshuab xyu ncig thoob plawg huv mej lub tebchaws.

Mej yuavtsum muab xyoo tsib caug ua xyoo tseemceeb rua mej hab tshaajtawm muab kev ywjpheej rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg huv mej lub tebchaws. Xyoo nuav tej teb kws mej yuav lug, yuavtsum thim rov qaab rua tug tswv qub lossis nwg tej xeebntxwv, hab txhua tug kws muab muag moog ua luas qhev lawm los yuavtsum xaa rov qaab moog rua nwg tsev tuabneeg.
Xyoo tsib caug ntawd, mej tsi xob cog qoob rua huv mej tej teb lossis hlais tej nplej kws nwg tuaj nwg lossis tsi xob dle tej txiv maab kws mej tsi tau taav huv mej tej vaaj txiv maab.
Rua qhov xyoo ntawd, yog xyoo dlawbhuv rua mej; mej muab tej kws nwg tuaj nwg huv mej tej teb lug noj xwb.
“Txhua yaam kws mej yuav lug, xyoo ntawd yuavtsum muab thim rov rua tug tswv qub.
Yog mej muag mej tej teb rua mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees lossis mej yuav nwg tej teb, mej tsi xob ua tsi ncaaj rua ib leeg tug twg.
Yuavtsum them tug nqe lawv le tej xyoo kws sau tau qoob huv dlaim teb ntawd ua ntej Xyoo kws thim Rov Qaab.
Yog has tas ntau xyoo, yuavtsum them tug nqe ntau, tabsis yog tsawg xyoo kuj them tug nqe tsawg, rua qhovmuag lawv le tej qoob kws sau tau huv dlaim teb ntawd.
Mej ib leeg tsi xob ua tsi ncaaj rua ib leeg, tabsis mej yuavtsum fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tug TSWV tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm, mej txhaj yuav tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug huv mej lub tebchaws.
Mej lub tebchaws yuav ntsu qoobloo heev, mej yuav muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag hab tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug.
“Tabsis mej nug has tas, yog xyoo xyaa ntawd peb tsi cog hab tsi sau qoobloo, peb yuav noj dlaabtsi txhaj le nyob dlhau xyoo?
Xyoo rau tug TSWV yuav foom koob moov rua lub tebchaws kuas ntsu qoob heev txaus noj peb xyoos.

Xyoo yim thaus mej cog qoob rua huv mej tej teb los mej tseem tau tej qoob kws thaus xyoo rau mej sau ca ntawd lug noj, hab mej tseem yuav tau noj moog txug thaus mej hlais mej tej qoob tshab xyoo yim ntawd.
“Tsi xob muab koj dlaim teb muag tuag rua luas, rua qhov koj tsi yog tug tswv; dlaim teb ntawd yog Vaajtswv tug. Koj zoo le tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug kuv nyob xwb.
“Thaus muab dlaim teb muag rua lwm tug lawm, tug tswv qub muaj cai txhwv dlaim teb ntawd rov qaab lug ua nwg tug.
Yog cov Yixalayees leejtwg txomnyem hab raug yuam kuas muab nwg dlaim teb muag, nwg cov kwvtij txheeb ze yuavtsum moog txhwv dlaim teb ntawd rov qaab.
Yog leejtwg tsi muaj kwvtij txheeb ze paab txhwv dlaim teb rov qaab, tom qaab kws nwg muaj nyaj txaus nwg yuavtsum txhwv rov qaab.

Nwg yuavtsum suav txij xyoo kws nwg muag dlaim teb moog txug xyoo thim, saib tau pistsawg xyoo, nwg yuavtsum them nyaj ntxiv rua tug kws yuav nwg dlaim teb. Nwg txhaj yuav rov tau dlaim teb lug ua nwg tug.

Tabsis yog nwg tsi muaj nyaj txaus txhwv dlaim teb ntawd rov qaab, ces dlaim teb ntawd tseem nyob ntawm tug tswv kws nwg muab muag rua moog txug Xyoo Thim tej teb. Xyoo ntawd maam thim tau dlaim teb rov rua tug tswv qub.
“Yog leejtwg muag nwg lub tsev nyob huv lub nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej, thawj xyoo kws txwm nkaus ib xyoos rua nub kws muag, nwg muaj cai txhwv tau rov qaab.

Tabsis yog nwg tsi txhwv rov qaab xyoo ntawd, ces nwg tsi muaj cai txhwv rov qaab lawm, lub tsev ntawd yuav yog tug kws nwg muab muag rua tug, hab nwg tej xeebntxwv tug moog le; thaus txug xyoo thim yuav tsi thim lub tsev lawm.

Tabsis tej tsev kws nyob huv tej zog kws tsi muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv, ua ib yaam le tej teb ntaag, tug tswv tsev qub muaj cai txhwv tej tsev ntawd rov qaab thaus txug xyoo thim tej teb hab tej tsev ntawd yuavtsum thim huv tuabsi rov qaab.
“Txawm yog le caag los xij, cov Levis muaj cai txhwv puab tej vaaj tse huv tej nroog kws tub muab tu rua puab lawm rov qaab lub sijhawm twg los tau.

Yog cov Levis leejtwg muab nwg lub tsev huv tej nroog kws tu ua puab tug lawm muag hab tseem tsi tau txhwv rov qaab, thaus txug Xyoo Thim  yuavtsum thim lub tsev ntawd rov qaab, rua qhov tej tsev ntawd nyob huv cov Levis tej nroog kws yog puab tug ntawm tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.
Tabsis tej teb kws nyob ibncig cov Levis tej nroog, tsi xob muab muag; tej ntawd yeej yog cov Levis tug moog ibtxhis le.

“Yog ib tug kwvtij Yixalayees kws nyob ze mej pluag hab tsi muaj noj tsi muaj haus, mej yuavtsum pub rua nwg kuas muaj noj muaj haus ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws mej ndlav ua num, nwg txhaj nrug mej nyob taug.
Tsi xob tsub paajlaum rua nwg them, tabsis mej yuavtsum fwm Vaajtswv hab ca mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees nyob ze mej.
Tsi xob tsub paajlaum rua nwg them tej nyaj kws mej qev rua nwg, hab tsi xob muab mej tej qoob muag ua nqe kim kim rua nwg.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, kuv muab lub tebchaws Kana-aas nuav rua mej nyob hab kuv yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Yog ib tug kwvtij Yixalayees kws nyob ze mej pluag heev hab nwg muab nwg muag ua mej qhev, mej tsi xob muab nwg ua num ib yaam le yog tug qhev.
Nwg nrug mej nyob ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws mej ndlav ua mej tej num hab ua num rua mej moog txug Xyoo Thim xwb.
Lub sijhawm ntawd, nwg hab nwg cov mivnyuas maam le tso mej tseg rov moog nrug nwg tsev tuabneeg nyob hab moog tuav nwg tej yawmkoob tej qubtxeeg qubteg.
Vim tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees yog kuv cov tubkhai, hab kuv tau coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, yuavtsum tsi xob muab puab muag moog ua luas qhev.
Mej tsi xob tswjfwm puab ntawm txujkev nruj tsiv hab tsimtxom, tabsis yuavtsum paub ntshai mej tug Vaajtswv.
Yog mej xaav tau tubqhe hab ntxhais qhev, mej yuavtsum muab nyaj moog yuav ntawm tej tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig mej xwb,
hab yuav tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob tej mivnyuas lug ua mej qhev. Cov mivnyuas ntawd yog cov yug huv mej lub tebchaws, puab txhaj yog mej tuabneeg,
hab puab yuav ua mej tej tubki, tej tuabneeg los tau. Puab yuav ua num rua mej moog taag puab simneej, tabsis mej tsi xob ua le ntawd rua mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees.

“Tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob, nwg muaj txag npluanuj, yog mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees leejtwg pluag hab nwg muab nwg muag rua tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws lossis tug npluanuj ntawd ib tug kwvtij coj moog ua qhev;
tom qaab kws nwg muab nwg muag taag lawm, nwg cov kwvtij tseem muaj cai txhwv tau nwg rov qaab; nwg cov tijlaug, cov kwv,
cov yawm laug, cov txiv ntxawm, cov kwvtij lossis lwm tug kwvtij kws txheeb ze yuavtsum txhwv nwg lossis yog nwg muaj nyaj txaus, nwg yuavtsum them nyaj txhwv nwg rov qaab.

Nwg yuavtsum moog nrug tug kws yuav nwg ntawd saablaaj, hab obtug suav txij xyoo kws nwg muab nwg muag lug txug Xyoo Thim hab yuavtsum kom tug nqe kws txhwv nwg ntawd kuas npaum le tej nqe kws ndlav ib tug tub zug ntaag.
Yog tseem tshuav ntau xyoo tug qhev ntawd yuavtsum thim tej nqe kws nwg tshuav ntawd ib nraab rov qaab lawv le tej xyoo kws nwg tshuav ntawd,
ib yaam le yog tug tswv ntawd ndlav nwg ua num ib ntus xwb. Nwg tug tswv yuavtsum tsi xob ua limham rua nwg.
Yog nwg tsi txhwv nwg lawv le kws has lug nuav, txug Xyoo Thim, tug tswv yuavtsum tso nwg hab nwg cov mivnyuas moog.
Tsi pub cov Yixalayees ua luas qhev moog le. Rua qhov tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees yog kuv cov tubkhai. Kuv yog tug coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug; kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej tsi xob puab mlom lossis puab mojzeeg, tsaa ncej zeb lossis muab pobzeb txaug ua mlom rua mej pe huv mej lub tebchaws. Kuv Yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Mej yuavtsum ceev kuv cov nub Xanpataus hab fwm qhov chaw pehawm kuv ua qhov chaw dlawbhuv. Kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Yog mej ua neej lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab fwm kuv tej lug,
kuv yuav tso dlej tso naag lug rua mej lawv caij lawv nyoog, kuas mej lub tebchaws ntsu qoobloo hab tej txiv ntoo los yuav txi txiv ncw heev.

Mej tej qoobloo yuav zoo heev ua rua mej muaj nplej hlais moog txug thaus lub caij dle txiv maab, hab mej yuav dle txiv maab moog txug thaus lub caij kws mej cog qoob. Mej yuav muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag, hab mej yuav tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug huv mej lub tebchaws moog le.

“Kuv yuav pub kuas mej lub tebchaws muaj kev thaajyeeb, hab mej yuav tau zoo pw tsaug zug tsi muaj leejtwg yuav ua rua mej ntshai. Kuv yuav muab tej tsaj nyaum huv lub tebchaws ua kuas tu noob taag, hab yuav tsi muaj kev tsuv kev rog nyob huv lub tebchaws le.
Mej yuav kovyeej mej cov yeebncuab. Mej raab ntaaj yuav ua rua puab swb,
Mej tsib leeg yuav tua yeej luas ib puas leej hab mej ib puas leej yuav tua yeej luas kaum txheeb leej.
Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua mej hab pub kuas mej muaj tubki coob heev; kuv yuav ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg kws kuv tau nrug mej sis coglug lawm.
Mej yuav sau tau qoobloo ntau nplua mag txaus mej noj thawm xyoo, hab yuav tau muab tej qoob qub kws tseem noj tsi taag yawm moog povtseg txhaj muaj chaw rau tej qoob tshab.
Kuv yuav nrug mej nyob huv kuv lub Tsevntaub kws dlawbhuv, hab kuv yuav tsi tso mej tseg ib zag le.
Kuv yuav nrug mej nyob; kuv yuav yog mej tug Vaajtswv, hab mej yuav yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, kuas mej txhaj tsi tau ua luas qhev ntxiv lawm. Kuv tub muab mej tej quabtwg luv povtseg hab ca mej tsaa taug taubhau moog kev.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Yog mej tsi noog kuv tej lug, mej yuav raug txim.
Yog mej tsi ua lawv kuv tej kevcai hab kuv tej lug saamfwm, hab tsi coj lawv le kuv tau coglug tseg rua mej,

kuv yuav rau txim rua mej. Kuv yuav tso sub tawg sub ntshaa lug rua mej, tej kaab mob kws khu tsi zoo hab tej kaab mob npaws yuav ua rua mej dligmuag hab ua rua mej lub neej suam kaum zuj zug. Mej cog qoobloo, tabsis yuav tsi tau noj, rua qhov mej tej yeebncuab yuav tua yeej mej hab tau noj tej qoob kws mej cog.
Kuv yuav tawmtsaam mej, mej yuav swb, hab cov tuabneeg kws ntxub mej yuav ua cov tswj mej; mej yuav ntshai heev. Txawm yog tsi muaj leejtwg caum mej los mej yuav tsiv tsi saib qaab.
“Tom qaab kws mej raug tej xwmtxheej nuav taag lawm, yog mej tseem tsi fwm kuv, kuv yuav rau txim rua mej kuas nyaav tshaaj qhov qub xyaa npaug ntxiv.
Kuv yuav rhuav mej txujkev tawv ncauj hab khaavtheeb kuas puamtsuaj moog. Kuv yuav tsi tso naag lug rua mej lub tebchaws, aav yuav qhuav tawv cuag hlau.
Mej yuav khwv kawg mej lub zug los tsi muaj qaabhau rua mej, rua qhov mej lub tebchaws yuav tsi zoo qoob hab tej txiv ntoo los yuav tsi txi txiv.
“Yog mej tseem tawmtsaam kuv hab tsi noog kuv lug, kuv yuav tsub kev rau txim rua mej kuas nyaav tshaaj qhov qub xyaa npaug ntxiv.

Kuv yuav tso tej tsaj qus kws nyaum heev lug tawmtsaam mej; tej tsaj ntawd yuav tum mej tej mivnyuas, tum mej tej tsaj txhu kuas tu noob hab ua kuas mej tshuav tsawg heev tsi pum muaj tuabneeg taug kev le lawm.
“Yog tom qaab tej kev rau txim nuav dlhau lawm, mej tseem tsi tig lug noog kuv lug, tabsis tseem pheej rau sab ntso tawmtsaam kuv ntxiv,
ces kuv yuav tawmtsaam mej hab rau txim rua mej kuas nyaav tshaaj qhov qub kws taag lug lawm xyaa npaug ntxiv.

Kuv yuav tso tuabneeg tuaj ua rog rua mej hab rau txim rua mej, vim mej rhuav kuv tej lug cog tseg hab txawm yog mej sis sau moog nyob huv mej tej nroog kuas mej muaj kev kaaj sab los kuv yuav tso tej mob phem lug raug mej, hab yuav muab mej cob rua mej cov yeebncuab teg.
Kuv yuav ua kuas mej tsi muaj mov noj, kaum leej quaspuj yuav koom ib lub qhovtxus cub tej mov kws puab muaj xwb. Puab yuav muab cov mov ntawd lug luj sis faib, hab thaus mej noj taag los tsi tsau.
“Yog tom qaab kws dlhau tej kev rau txim nuav taag lawm, mej tseem tawv hab tsi noog kuv lug,
ces kuv yuav chim rua mej, hab rau txim rua mej nyaav tshaaj qhov qub xyaa npaug ntxiv.
Mej yuav muaj kev tshaib nqhes heev, hab mej yuav noj mej tej tub tej ntxhais kws mej yug.

Kuv yuav rhuav tshem mej tej chaw pe dlaab sau tej ncov roob, muab mej tej thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab tsoo povtseg, hab muab mej tej cev tuag pov rua sau tej mlom kws yog mlom tuag; kuv yuav ntxub mej heev.
Kuv yuav muab mej tej nroog ntxeev kuas puag taag, kuv yuav rhuav tshem mej tej chaw pe mlom kuas puamtsuaj, hab kuv yuav tsi txais mej tej khoom fij kws tsw qaab ntxag ntawd.
Kuv yuav rhuav kuas mej lub tebchaws puamtsuaj qhuav nkig nkuav ua rua mej cov yeebncuab kws tuaj tswjfwm mej xaav tsi thoob le.

Kuv yuav tso tuabneeg tuaj ua rog rua mej hab muab mej lawv kuas tawg ri sua moog nrug tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws nyob. Mej lub tebchaws yuav caj nroj tsuag, hab ca mej tej nroog raug puamtsuaj taag tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob.

Ces mej lub tebchaws yuav zoo sab rua ntau xyoo kws tau su pauj rua tej kws mej tsi pub kuas tau su; mej lub tebchaws yuav tau zoo pw hab su thaus mej raug ntab tawm moog ua tuabneeg thojnaam nyob rua huv mej cov yeebncuab lub tebchaws lawm.

“Kuv yuav ua kuas mej cov kws raug ntab tawm moog ntawd ntshai heev nyob huv mej cov yeebncuab lub tebchaws. Cua ntsawj tej nplooj ntoos nrov xwb los mej yuav dlha tsi saib qaab. Mej yuav dlha cuag le thaus luas caum mej huv tshaav rog, txawm yog tsi muaj yeebncuab nyob ze los mej yuav qaug pawg lug.
Mej ib leeg yuav dlawm ib leeg qaug, thaus tsi muaj leejtwg caum nteg mej, hab mej yuav tsi muaj cuabkaav tua mej cov yeebncuab hlo le.
Mej yuav tuag taag rua huv luas teb luas chaw, hab mej cov yeebncuab lub tebchaws yuav muab mej nqog taag huv tuabsi.
Mej cov kws seem nyob huv mej cov yeebncuab lub tebchaws, tej roj ntshaa yuav sem zuj zug, vim mej tej kev txhum hab mej cov yawmkoob tej kev txhum.
“Tabsis yog mej cov xeebntxwv leeg puab tej kev txhum hab puab cov yawmkoob tej kev txhum kws puab tau tawmtsaam kuv hab ntxeev sab rua kuv,
hab ua rua kuv muab puab ntab moog nyob rua huv puab cov yeebncuab lub tebchaws, yog has tas puab txu puab lub sab kws tsi fwm Vaajtswv hab nyob puab lub txim taag lawm;
kuv yuav ncu txug tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua Yakhauj, Ixaj hab Anplahaas puab, hab kuv yuav rov ncu txug lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg lawm.

Tabsis yuavtsum xub muab cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws ntawd ntab tawm ua ntej, kuas lub tebchaws txhaj tau su. Hab puab yuavtsum raug txim vim qhov kws puab muab kuv tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm tso tseg lawm.

Tabsis txawm le ntawd los xij, thaus puab tseem nyob huv puab cov yeebncuab lub tebchaws, kuv yuav tsi tso puab tseg lossis rhuav kuas puab puamtsuaj tu noob. Kuv yuav tsi rhuav lu lug kws kuv cog tseg rua puab lawm, hab kuv yog tug TSWV puab tug Vaajtswv.

Kuv yuav rov coglug rua puab ib yaam le kuv tau coglug rua puab cov yawmkoob kws thaus kuv lub fwjchim tau coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug taabmeeg txhua tsaav tuabneeg lawm, kuv yog puab tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Taagnrho tej nuav puavleej yog tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm kws tug TSWV muab rua Mauxes sau Roob Xinais, kuas muab qha rua cov tuabneeg Yixalayees.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, thaus muaj ib tug twg coglug muab nwg fij pub rua tug TSWV, tug tuabneeg ntawd yuavtsum them nyaj le nraag qaab nuav,

kom tug nqe lawv le numtswv kevcai: -tug txivneej kws muaj noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo moog txug rau caum xyoo: them tsib caug dlaim nyaj. -Tug quaspuj: them peb caug dlaim nyaj -tug txivneej kws muaj noobnyoog tsib xyoos moog txug rau caum xyoo: them neeg nkaum dlaim nyaj. -Tug ntxhais hluas: them kaum dlaim nyaj. -Tug mivnyuas tub kws muaj noobnyoog tsib xyoos rov huv: them tsib dlaim nyaj. -Tug mivnyuas ntxhais kws muaj noobnyoog tsib xyoos rov huv: them peb dlaim nyaj. -Tug txivneej kws muaj noobnyoog rau caum xyoo rov sau: them kaum tsib dlaim nyaj. -Tug quaspuj kws muaj noobnyoog rau caum xyoo rov sau: them kaum dlaim nyaj.

“Yog tug tuabneeg kws coglug tseg ntawd txomnyem them tsi taug lawv le tug nqe kws kom tseg nuav los yuavtsum coj tug tuabneeg ntawd moog cuag tug povthawj, hab tug povthawj yuav muab tug nqe txu kuas tsawg lawv le tug tuabneeg ntawd muaj peevxwm them taug rua nwg them.
“Yog tug tuabneeg ntawd coglug muab tug tsaj kws tsimnyog moog fij rua tug TSWV, mas txhua yaam ntawd yuavtsum yog yaam dlawbhuv.
Tug tuabneeg kws coglug ntawd yuavtsum tsi xob muab dlua lwm tug tsaj tuaj hloov tug tsaj ntawd chaw. Yog nwg hloov, ces ob tug tsaj ntawd puavleej yog tug TSWV tug.
Tabsis yog nwg coglug muab tug tsaj kws tsi tsimnyog fij rua tug TSWV, tug txivneej ntawd yuavtsum coj tug tsaj ntawd moog rua tug povthawj.
Ces tug povthawj maam le muab tug tsaj ntawd lug kom nqe lawv le tug tsaj ntawd zoo lossis phem, hab tsuas ntaus tug nqe lawv le ntawd xwb.
Yog tug tuabneeg ntawd xaav txhwv tug tsaj ntawd rov qaab, nwg yuavtsum them neeg nkaum feem pua ntxiv rua tug nqe tsaj ntawd.
“Thaus muaj ib tug twg muab nwg lub tsev fij rua tug TSWV, tug povthawj yuavtsum muab ntaus nqe lawv le lub tsev ntawd zoo lossis phem, tsuas ntaus tug nqe le ntawd xwb.
Yog tug kws fij lub tsev ntawd xaav txhwv lub tsev rov qaab, nwg yuavtsum them neeg nkaum feem pua ntxiv rua tug nqe tsev ntawd.

“Yog ib tug twg muab nwg dlaim teb ib feem fij rua tug TSWV, tug povthawj yuavtsum muab ntaus nqe kuas tsimnyog lawv le dlaim teb ntawd yuav tseb tau noob qoob npaum le caag rua huv, qhov kws txaus tseb ib kawm noob nplej ntaus nqe kaum dlaim nyaj.
Yog dlhau plawg Xyoo Thim, nwg txawm muab nwg dlaim teb fij, ces muab ntaus nqe kuas puv nkaus rua nwg them.
Yog tub dlhau Xyoo Thim lawm, nwg maam le muab nwg dlaim teb fij, tug Povthawj yuav nrug kom tug nqe lawv le tej xyoo ntawd moog txug Xyoo Thim, hab muab tug nqe txu kuas qeg.
Yog tug kws fij nwg dlaim teb ntawd xaav txhwv rov qaab, nwg yuavtsum them neeg nkaum feem pua ntxiv rua tug nqe ntawd.
Yog nwg tsi xaav txhwv nwg dlaim teb rov qaab lossis nwg tub xub muab muag rua lwm tug lawm, ces nwg tsi muaj cai txhwv dlaim teb ntawd rov qaab le lawm.
Ces thaus rov txug Xyoo Thim, dlaim teb ntawd yuav ua tug TSWV tug moog le, hab yog cov povthawj tug.
“Yog ib tug twg muab nwg dlaim teb kws nwg yuav lug fij rua tug TSWV,
tug nqe yuavtsum kom lawv le tej xyoo moog txug rua Xyoo Thim, hab tug tuabneeg ntawd yuavtsum them tug nqe rua nub ntawd. Cov nyaj ntawd yog tug TSWV tug.
Thaus txug Xyoo Thim, yuavtsum muab dlaim teb ntawd thim rov rua tug tswv qub lossis nwg cov xeebntxwv.
“Txhua yaam nqe yuavtsum muab kom kuas lawv le numtswv txuj cai.

“Thawj tug mivnyuas tsaj yeej yog tug TSWV tug le lawm, tsi pub leejtwg muab tug tsaj ntawd tuaj fij ua kev zoo sab rua nwg, tsi has mivnyuas nyuj, mivnyuas yaaj lossis mivnyuas tshis los puavleej yog tug TSWV tug,

tabsis yog cov tsaj kws tsi huv thawj tug mivnyuas, yuavtsum txhwv rov qaab lawv le tug nqe kws tau kom tseg hab ntxiv ib feem tsib rua tug nqe ntawd. Yog nwg tsi txhwv tug tsaj ntawd rov qaab, ces muab muag rua lwm tug lawv le tug nqe kws tau kom tseg lawm los tau.

“Txhua yaam kws tau coglug muab fij  rua tug TSWV lawm, txawm yog tuabneeg lossis tsaj txhu lossis teb, tsi pub muab muag lossis txhwv rov qaab le. Rua qhov tej ntawd yog yaam dlawbhuv heev rua tug TSWV lawm.
Yog tau coglug nrug tug TSWV lawm has tas, yuav muab ib tug twg ua kuas puamtsuaj moog, mas tsi pub txhwv rov qaab le lawm, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua kuas tuag xwb.
“Taagnrho tej qoobloo huv tej teb lossis tej txiv maab, txiv ntoo ib feem kaum, yeej yog tug TSWV tug.
Yog leejtwg xaav txhwv qee yaam rov qaab, nwg yuavtsum them ib feem tsib ntxiv rua tug nqe kws tau kom tseg.
Taagnrho tej tsaj nyeg los ib feem kaum yeej yog tug TSWV tug. Thaus suav tej tsaj txhu, kaum tug twg muab ib tug ua tug TSWV tug.

Tug tswv tsaj tsi xob xaiv tug tsaj zoo tawm ntawm tug tsaj phem, hab tsi xob muab tej tsaj lug sis hloov. Yog nwg muab tug tsaj nuav moog hloov tug tsaj tom chaw, ces ob tug tsaj ntawd puavleej yog tug TSWV tug huv tuabsi, hab txhwv tsi tau rov qaab le lawm.”
Ntawm nuav yog cov lug saamfwm kws tug TSWV has rua Mauxes sau Roob Xinais, kuas coj lug qha rua cov Yixalayees.
